Who is HostXNow?

HostXNow specialises in offering high-quality hosting services at the best possible price. HostXNow offer the fastest hosting powered by cPanel and hosted in the Cloud with 24x7 live chat support. If you want the best-managed cPanel hosting services from the UK, choose HostXNow!

All of HostXNow's VPS Hosting plans include cPanel web hosting control panel, free SSL certificates, unlimited bandwidth, fast SSD storage and are fully optimised for WordPress.

Our Server Location: Maidenhead, UK
